scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && deno fmt src
scripts.dts: yarn tsc -d src/shaDB.ts >/dev/null || echo done  && mv src/shaDB.d.ts dist/  && rm src/shaDB.js
scripts.build: deno bundle --import-map ../../import_map.json --no-check --unstable src/shaDB.ts dist/shaDB.js && yarn dts && yarn minify
scripts.minify: deno fmt dist && yarn esbuild dist/shaDB.js --tree-shaking="ignore-annotations" --minify  --minify-identifiers --minify-syntax --outfile=dist/shaDB.min.js
